column2: Difficult respiration; two primary tumor sites
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumors
Two primary tumor sites; 1 found near the base of the skull and 1 slightly below shoulder blades
Skull was in tact; small met noticed upon visual inspection
Heart and lungs looked healthy upon visual inspection
1 cryogenic tube of tumor tissue was frozen down.
